thoughts.text: I can use the get_hyperlinks command to get a summary of the hyperlinks on a website that I want to explore.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the get_hyperlinks command will allow me to get a summary of the hyperlinks on a website that I want to explore. This will help me quickly identify which links are most relevant to my goals and interests.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the get_hyperlinks command to get a summary of the hyperlinks on a website that I want to explore
- Decide which links are most relevant to my goals and interests
- Use the browse_website command to explore the most relevant links
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to spend too much time exploring websites and make sure to balance it with my other goals. I should also be mindful of the credibility and accuracy of the information I find on websites.
thoughts.speak: I will now use the get_hyperlinks command to get a summary of the hyperlinks on a website that I want to explore. Which website would you like me to explore?
